abstract: Blackstone Group has nailed down three commitments so far to its landmark renminbi-denominated fund for China, with the country’s national pension fund expected to be a major investor, Reuters reported.
snippet: Blackstone Group has nailed down three commitments so far to its landmark renminbi-denominated fund for China, with the country’s national pension fund expected to be a major investor, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Blackstone Group has nailed down three commitments so far to its landmark renminbi-denominated fund for China, with the country’s national pension fund expected to be a major investor, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Blackstone Said to Attract Investors for China Fund
